name: Sumo Queries.txt - To check file push and pull failures
description: This section provides a Sumo Logic query that can be used to search for error logs related to file push and pull failures in a product named 'beam'. The query filters the logs from the 'prod_beam' index, extracts the 'level' field from the JSON-formatted logs, and displays only the logs where the 'level' field is set to 'error'. This can help identify and troubleshoot issues related to file transfer operations in the 'beam' product.
use_cases: Troubleshooting file transfer failures in the 'beam' product
Monitoring and analyzing error logs related to file push and pull operations
Identifying and resolving issues with file transfer processes
Auditing and reporting on file transfer errors

name: Sumo Queries.txt - To check file push success/list all files pulled
description: This section provides a Sumo Logic query that can be used to check the success of file transfers via SFTP and list all the files that have been pulled (downloaded) from a remote server. The query filters the logs for entries related to a specific 'beam_job_name' and the 'SFTP_PUT_SUCCESSFUL' message, extracts the 'job_type' field, and then filters the results to only show entries where the job_type is 'pull'.
use_cases: Monitoring the success of file transfers via SFTP
Listing all files that have been pulled (downloaded) from a remote server
